settings.title: Can anyone visit your showroom?
settings.content: Absolutely!  We hope everyone will have a chance to visit and be inspired by our amazing collection of vendors.  The Dallas and Houston showrooms are open 9am – 5pm, Monday through Friday.  The Austin location is a by appointment only Trade Resource Library for designers to schedule meetings.

settings.title: Where are you located?
settings.content:
Our Dallas Showroom is located in the Dallas Design Center at 1025 N. Stemmons Fwy #210, adjacent to CODARUS.  

Our new Houston Showroom is located on the Third Floor of the Decorative Center of Houston at 5120 Woodway, Suite #3029

The Austin location is a  By-Appointment Trade Resource Library for interior designers located at  1411 West 6th Street Unit B.   Parking is available on Oakland Ave. (turn left on Oakland just before you reach the showroom),

settings.title: How do I open a trade account?
settings.content: Simple!  Please fill out the trade application on our website or email  the showroom and we. will send you the appropriate form to fill out and return to us.  You will need to include a copy of your tax permit, a business card, or other identifying business information.  If you require immediate assistance, please reach out to us at either houston@jamesshowroom.com or dallas@jamesshowroom.com and we will be happy to help!

settings.title: How can I get a price quote?
settings.content: We ask that designers contact the showroom directly for any fabric, wallpaper, lighting, furniture, or carpet quotes before submitting a proposal to their clients. For our trade clients with a verified login, we now offer online pricing for reference only. We are not liable for any prices presented to clients that were not part of a formal quote from our showroom sales team. Prices are subject to change and the website may not reflect accurate pricing.
